titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992.
National Geologic Mapping Act Reauthorization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 691.

action.text: By Senator Murkowski from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report. Report No. 115-404.

bill.summary:
National Geologic Mapping Act Reauthorization Act
This bill amends the National Geologic Mapping Act of 1992 to reauthorize the National Cooperative Geologic Mapping Program of the U.S. Geological Survey through FY2023.
